h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tiger Tendon Belt Location
content: The Tiger Tendon Belt can be found randomly from the Tiger Monks in The Webbed Hollow. The best place to farm this is at the Court of Illumination in the Temple of Yellow Flowers.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Tendon_Belt.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Tendon Belt', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tiger Tendon Belt Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger Tendon Belt can be found randomly from the Tiger Monks in The Webbed Hollow. The best place to farm this is at the Court of Illumination in the Temple of Yellow Flowers.
